Privacy_Policy_Coming_Soon: Our privacy policy is currently being updated. Please check back soon.
Cookie_Policy_Coming_Soon: Our cookie policy is currently being updated. Please check back soon.
Cookie_Policy_What_Is_Cookie_Description: This cookie policy explains what cookies are and how we use them, the types of cookies we use, i.e., the information we collect using cookies and how that information is used, and how to manage cookie settings.
Cookie_Policy_What_Is_Cookie_Explanation: Cookies are small text files used to store small pieces of information. They are stored on your device when the website is loaded in your browser. These cookies help us make the website work properly, make it more secure, provide a better user experience, understand how the website works and analyze what works and what needs to be improved.
Cookie_Policy_How_We_Use_First_Party: Like most online services, our website uses first-party and third-party cookies for several purposes. First-party cookies are essentially necessary for the website to function properly and do not collect any personal data that can identify you.
Cookie_Policy_How_We_Use_Third_Party: The third-party cookies used on our website are mainly used to understand how the website works, how you interact with our website, to ensure the security of our services, to provide relevant advertisements for you and, overall, to provide you with a better and improved user experience and to speed up your future interactions with our website.
Cookie_Policy_Manage_Preferences_Descrip: You can modify your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the button above. This will allow you to return to the cookie consent banner and modify your preferences or withdraw your consent immediately.
Cookie_Policy_Browser_Methods: In addition, browsers offer different methods for blocking and deleting cookies used by websites. You can change your browser settings to block/delete cookies. Below are links to the support documents for managing and deleting cookies for the main web browsers.
Cookie_Policy_Other_Browser: If you are using another web browser, please consult your browser's official support documents.
Privacy_Policy_Introduction: This privacy policy describes the policies of Flash-Loan, 5400 Rue Jean-Talon O, Unit #806, Montréal, Québec H4P 2T5, Canada, email: flashloan.rh@gmail.com, phone: (450) 235-8461 regarding the collection, use and disclosure of your information that we collect when you use our website (https://flash-loan.ca/). (the "Service"). By accessing or using the Service, you consent to the collection, use and disclosure of your information in accordance with this privacy policy. If you do not consent, please do not access or use the Service.
Privacy_Policy_Changes: We may modify this privacy policy at any time without prior notice to you and will post the revised privacy policy on the service. The revised policy will take effect 180 days after it is posted on the service and your continued access or use of the service after this date will constitute your acceptance of the revised privacy policy. We therefore recommend that you review this page regularly.
Privacy_Policy_Information_We_Collect_De: We will collect and process the following personal information about you:
Privacy_Policy_How_We_Use_Description: We will use the information we collect about you for the following purposes:
Privacy_Policy_Use_Other_Purposes: If we want to use your information for other purposes, we will ask for your consent and will only use your information after receiving your consent and, thereafter, only for the purposes for which you have given your consent, unless the law requires us to do otherwise.
Privacy_Policy_How_We_Share_Description: We will not transfer your personal information to any third party without your consent, except in the limited circumstances described below:
Privacy_Policy_Share_Third_Parties: We require these third parties to use the personal information we transfer to them only for the purposes for which it was transferred and not to retain it longer than necessary to achieve those purposes.
Privacy_Policy_Share_Disclosure: We may also disclose your personal information in the following cases: (1) to comply with applicable law, regulation, court order or other judicial process; (2) to enforce the agreements you have entered into with us, including this privacy policy; or (3) to respond to claims that your use of the service violates the rights of a third party. If the service or our company is merged or acquired by another company, your information will be one of the assets transferred to the new owner.
Privacy_Policy_Retention_Description: We will retain your personal information for 90 days to 2 years after users have terminated their account or for as long as we need it to achieve the purposes for which it was collected, as stated in this privacy policy. We may need to retain certain information for longer periods, for example for record keeping or reporting in accordance with applicable law or for other legitimate reasons such as enforcement of legal rights, fraud prevention, etc. Residual anonymous information and aggregated information, which cannot identify you (directly or indirectly), may be stored indefinitely.
Privacy_Policy_Your_Rights_Description: Depending on applicable law, you may have a right to access and rectify or erase your personal data or receive a copy of your personal data, restrict the active processing of your data or object to it, ask us to share (port) your personal data with another entity, withdraw any consent you have given us to process your data, a right to lodge a complaint with a statutory authority and any other relevant right under applicable law.
Privacy_Policy_Your_Rights_Contact: To exercise these rights, you can write to us at
Privacy_Policy_Your_Rights_Response: We will respond to your request in accordance with applicable law.
Privacy_Policy_Your_Rights_Note: Please note that if you do not allow us to collect or process the required personal information or if you withdraw your consent to process such information for the required purposes, you may not be able to access or use the services for which your information was requested.
Privacy_Policy_Cookies_Description: To learn more about how we use these technologies and the choices available to you regarding these tracking technologies, please see our
Privacy_Policy_Security_Description: The security of your information is important to us and we will use reasonable security measures to prevent loss, misuse or unauthorized modification of your information under our control. However, given the inherent risks, we cannot guarantee absolute security and, therefore, we cannot ensure or guarantee the security of the information you transmit to us and you do so at your own risk.
Privacy_Policy_Third_Party_Links: Third Party Links and Use of Your Information
Privacy_Policy_Third_Party_Links_Descrip: Our service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. This privacy policy does not address the privacy policy and other practices of third parties, including third parties operating a website or service accessible by a link on the service. We strongly advise you to review the privacy policy of each site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of third party sites or services.
Privacy_Policy_Data_Protection_Officer_D: If you have any questions or concerns regarding the processing of your information available with us, you may email our grievance officer at Flash-Loan, 5400 Rue Jean-Talon O, Unit #806, Montréal, email:
Privacy_Policy_Data_Protection_Officer_R: We will address your concerns in accordance with applicable law.
How_It_Works_Subtitle: Learn how our loan process works
Contact_Subtitle: Get in touch with our team
How_It_Works_Coming_Soon: This page will explain how our loan process works. Coming soon!
How_It_Works_Page_Title: How Flash-Loan Works: Guide to Fast and Flexible Loans
How_It_Works_Fast_Loans_Description: Get fast loans thanks to our simplified and efficient application process. At Flash-Loan, you can easily submit your application online and receive a quick response, without needing to travel. We offer you immediate access to financing solutions adapted to your needs, whether for a micro-loan or a personal loan. Take advantage of our fast and transparent service to realize your projects in no time!
How_It_Works_Fast_Loans_Image_Alt: Money handed to a client for Fast Loans
How_It_Works_Accessible_Conditions_Descr: At Flash-Loan, we offer simple and transparent loan conditions, ideal for all your financial needs. Our Fast Loans are accessible to Canadians aged 18 and over, with competitive maximum interest rates of 29% per year. Take advantage of our commitment to transparency and simplicity to obtain the financing you need, whether for a micro-loan or a personal loan. Don't let complex conditions hold you back, choose Flash-Loan for accessible credit solutions adapted to your situation.
How_It_Works_Flexible_Repayment_Descript: Choose the repayment plan that best matches your financial needs in terms of fast loans at Flash-Loan. We offer flexible repayment periods ranging from 90 to 150 days, allowing you to manage your payments at your own pace, without additional stress. Whether you opt for a micro-loan or a personal loan, our goal is to provide you with adapted solutions that facilitate your repayment experience. Take advantage of our personalized approach to guarantee peace of mind throughout the financing process.
How_It_Works_Loan_Renewal_Description: At Flash-Loan, we understand that your financial needs can evolve over time. That's why we offer the possibility to renew your loan at maturity or even before, giving you greater flexibility in your financial management. Whether for a micro-loan or a personal loan, our renewal process is simple and designed to adapt to your expectations. Take advantage of our flexible fast loan service to maintain a serene financial future and meet all your requirements.
How_It_Works_Loan_Renewal_Image_Alt: Fast Loans agent shaking hands with a client
Repayment_Coming_Soon: This page will detail our repayment options and schedules. Coming soon!
Repayment_Page_Title: Flexible Repayment Options for Your Loans at Flash-Loan
Repayment_At_Your_Pace: Repay your loan at your own pace.
Repayment_At_Your_Pace_Description: Repay your loan at your pace with Flash-Loan. We offer several repayment solutions tailored to your unique needs. Choose the automatic withdrawal frequency that suits you best, whether weekly, bi-weekly or monthly. Our goal is to provide you with a stress-free repayment process, so you can manage your finances serenely while benefiting from our micro-loan and personal loan services.
Repayment_Simplified_Experience: Simplified Loan Experience: Quick and Efficient Solutions at Flash-Loan
Repayment_Flexible_Term_Description: At Flash-Loan, your loan repayment term is adjusted based on the amount borrowed. You have the option to repay immediately or extend your term up to 60 days depending on what suits you best. This flexibility allows you to better manage your finances while ensuring quick access to our micro-loan and personal loan solutions. Take advantage of our tailored options for stress-free repayment!
Repayment_Interest_Rates: Interest Rates Adapted to Your Needs
Repayment_Interest_Rates_Description: With Flash-Loan, benefit from unique interest rates that adjust to your financial situation. You can adapt your repayment plan based on your resources and commitments. Our flexibility allows you to manage your payments serenely, while benefiting from our micro-loan and personal loan solutions. Choose a repayment option that matches your lifestyle and financial capabilities for a hassle-free loan experience with our micro-loans.
Contact_Coming_Soon: This page will provide contact information and support options. Coming soon!
Get_Personal_Loan_Title: Get your personal loan in a few clicks, without credit check.
Get_Up_To_1500_Today: Get up to $1,500 today and repay at your own pace!
Hero_Image_Placeholder: Personal loan agent ready to serve clients
What_Makes_Us_Unique: What makes us unique in fast and personal loans
Simplified_Procedures_Description: Our application process is quick and hassle-free, giving you easy access to quick credit and instant credit, without waiting in a branch. Thanks to our simplified approach, you can quickly get the financing you need.
Total_Transparency_Description: We guarantee clear conditions without surprises, respecting all Canadian regulations, including our no documentation loan options and no credit check, for your peace of mind. You can thus benefit from financing with confidence, without additional constraint.
Flexible_Repayment_Description: With customizable repayment options, including no documentation loan solutions and micro-loans, you can manage your payments according to your pace, thus reducing financial stress. These flexible options allow you to access funds quickly while adapting your repayments to your needs.
About_Us_Description: At Flash-Loan, our mission is to simplify access to fast loans for everyone. With several years of experience in the sector, we offer a variety of solutions, including micro-loans, quick credits and instant credits, to meet the financial needs of our clients. We remain compliant with Canadian regulations while guaranteeing total transparency with our micro-loans.
About_Image_Placeholder: Artistic workspace featuring calligraphy and digital design
Fast_Affordable_Loans_For_All_Needs: Fast and affordable loans for all needs
Fast_Loans_Description: Get a personal loan in a few minutes in a simple and fast way, all online, without any complication or hassle.
Accessible_Conditions_Image: Contract signing with hands over documents
Accessible_Conditions_Description: Enjoy flexible conditions adapted to all types of borrowers with our micro-loans.
Flexible_Repayment_Image: Wallet with Canadian currency in car interior
Flexible_Repayment_Step_Description: Benefit from personalized repayment options that perfectly adapt to your financial situation.
Testimonial_1_Text: Flash-Loan helped me resolve financial emergencies quickly. The process was simple and the fund transfer was very fast!
Testimonial_2_Text: I found their service very efficient and transparent. I felt supported throughout the application process.
Age_Residence_Income_Requirements: Be over 18 years old, reside in Canada and have a stable income.
Repayment_Plan_Description: Choose the repayment plan that suits you best with our micro-loans. You have a minimum of 1 month (30 days) to repay, and a maximum of 6 months (180 days) for your personal loans.
Amortization_Schedule_Description: You can repay at your own pace without additional stress. Borrow responsibly and in moderation.
Financial_Assistance_Description: We strongly recommend evaluating your needs and not requesting a higher amount than necessary.
Repayment_Options_Description: Our company offers repayment options that comply with the terms of our client agreement. You can repay your instant credit before the usual 3-month period and also have the possibility of making partial payments or settling the total balance at any time.
Bi_Weekly_Example: For a $300 quick loan with 29% interest, repaid in 6 payments, each payment will be $87.50. Total amount to repay: $525.
About_Hero_Subtitle: Learn about our mission to make loans easy and accessible through our range of micro-loans and personal loans
Mission_Description: At Flash-Loan, our mission is to make loans easy and accessible, particularly through our range of micro-loans and personal loans. With several years of experience in the sector, we have developed customized solutions, including quick loans and instant loans, to meet the varied financial needs of our clients.
Vision_Description: We believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to obtain financial support, regardless of their background. We work tirelessly to ensure that every experience with us is positive, fast and accessible. Thanks to our expertise and passion for helping people, we are determined to transform the way our clients interact with the world of credit.
Team_Description: Our team, made up of qualified and passionate professionals, understands the daily financial challenges our clients face. Each of our members is committed to providing exceptional customer service and ensuring a smooth process, particularly when applying for quick loans and micro-loans.
Contract_Signing_Image_Alt: Professional businessman presenting contract to woman for signature
Quick_Easy_Description: Access secure and fast loans, including personal loans, directly from your home. With our no credit check option, you don't need to travel or wait in a branch. Enjoy instant access to financial solutions tailored to your needs, all from the comfort of your home.
Customer_Service_Description: Benefit from flexible repayments adapted to your pace with competitive interest rates for your personal loan. Flash-Loan adapts to your needs, allowing you to manage your finances effectively and serenely. We are here to help you realize your projects while offering you a suitable financing solution.
Flexible_Personalized_Repayment_Descript: Enjoy financial assistance without additional stress, thanks to a transparent process and full compliance with local regulations in force. At Flash-Loan, we also offer loans without documentation, thus simplifying the process for our clients while respecting their financial needs.
Compliance_Description: We are proud of our compliance with Canadian laws and our commitment to transparency, particularly by offering loans without credit checks and loans without documentation. These innovative options allow our clients to benefit from quick access to funds without the usual hassles.
No_Credit_Check_Description: Get approved without traditional credit verification processes
No_Documentation_Description: Simplified application process with minimal paperwork requirements
CTA_Description: Sign up online today and benefit from an incredible offer of up to $1,500! Don't miss this opportunity.
Contact_Us_Title: Contact Us | Flash-Loan – A Reliable Micro-Loan Provider
Contact_Us_Subtitle: Contact Flash-Loan for any questions about our micro-loans and personal loans.
Contact_Us_Description: Contact us today for quick answers and personalized assistance!
Full_Address: 5400 Rue Jean-Talon O, Unit #806, Montréal, QC, H4P 2T5
FAQ_Question_1: Q: What types of loans do you offer?
FAQ_Answer_1: A: We offer a variety of financial solutions, including micro-credits and personal loans, tailored to your needs.
FAQ_Question_2: Q: Do you do a credit check for micro-loans?
FAQ_Answer_2: A: Many of our options, including micro-loans, do not require a credit check, making it easier to access funds.
FAQ_Question_3: Q: How long does it take to get approved?
FAQ_Answer_3: A: Our process is fast and simple; most approvals are done within a few hours.
Contact_Form_Description: Our team is here to help. Don't hesitate to ask us your questions.
Apply_Description: Our online loan application portal is under development. Soon you'll be able to apply for your personal loan in just a few clicks!

Answer_Simple_Questions: Just answer a few simple question and we'll suggest a solution that meets your borrowing needs.

Must_Be_Canadian: You must be a Canadian resident
Bankruptcy_Question: Are you planning to declare bankrupt or make a consumer proposal in the next 6 months?

Bankruptcy_Warning: WARNING! If you declare bankruptcy or a consumer proposal before the end of your contract, you may be charged for fraud under the bankruptcy and insolvency law.
